title: Future Value of Ordinary Annuity
equation: FVA = PMT \times \frac{(1 + r)^{n} - 1}{r} = PMT \times \frac{1 - (1 + r)^{-n}}{r} \times (1 + r)^{n}
notes: This equation calculates the future value of an ordinary annuity

title: Present Value of Ordinary Annuity

title: Future Value of Annuity Due
equation: FVAD = PMT \times \frac{(1 + r)^{n} - 1}{r} \times (1 + r) = FVA \times (1 + r)

title: Present Value of Annuity Due
equation: PVAD = PMT \times \frac{1 - (1 + r)^{-n}}{r} \times (1 + r) = PVA \times (1 + r)

title: Loan Payment Formula

title: Coupon Bond Price
equation: P = \sum_{t=1}^{n} \frac{C}{(1 + y)^{t}} + \frac{F}{(1 + y)^{n}} = \underbrace{\frac{C}{y} \left[1 - (1 + y)^{-n}\right]}_{\text{annuity factor}} + \underbrace{\frac{F}{(1 + y)^{n}}}_{\text{principal PV}}
notes: This equation decomposes coupon bond pricing into annuity and lump-sum components

title: Convexity

notes: This equation measures the curvature of the bond price-yield relationship

title: Price Change Approximation
